about.title: About Stargate
about.missionText: To educate and inform the public about cutting-edge technologies in AI, cloud computing, and advanced data processing through transparent, accessible content.
about.visionText: Building a global community of innovators and learners who understand the transformative power of technology and its ethical implications.
about.disclaimerText: This site is an independent educational initiative, not an official representative of the Stargate project. All content is based on publicly available information.
